siteConfig.defaultTitle: Aspen UI - Providing modern, customizable components, easily integrable and open source.
siteConfig.description: Aspen UI is a modern collection of user interface components designed for React and Next.js applications. The components are accessible, customizable, and easily integrate into any React-based project. This component kit stands out for its flexibility and accessibility, surpassing the limitations of traditional solutions.
siteConfig.creator: Ignacio Figueroa
siteConfig.keywords: Aspen UI, user interface components, React, Next.js, customizable components, open source, web development, component library, accessibility, easy integration, modern components, JavaScript frameworks, UI kit
